abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33394568, pmid33440088, pmid33450180, pmid33439057, pmid33410884, pmid33394052, pmid33419948, pmid33450303, pmid33433853, pmid33447107
